typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as short,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as integer,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empsrccsv
empsrccsv rank(desc(SAL, true),
	output(sal_rank as long)) ~> Ranking
Ranking rank(desc(SAL, true),
	output(sal_dense_rank as long),
	dense: true) ~> DenseRank
DenseRank sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rankDense
